casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2007-0452. Allstate Ins. Co. v. Cleveland Elec. Illuminating Co.

Cuyahoga App. No. 87781, 2007-0hio-157. Reported at 119 Ohio St.3d 301, 2008-0hio-3917, 893 N.E.2d 824. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents.
